data.comment: The match is underway in Toluca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Toluca just outside Tigres's area.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Toluca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca's Raul Lopez has been booked in Toluca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 15, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Luis Rodriguez of Tigres gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Toluca a goal kick.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 21, Tigres drives forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In Toluca, Jesus Duenas of Tigres is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 26, Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca's Enrique Triverio has run offside.
Important block from the Toluca defence as Luis Quinones fires in a strike for Tigres.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Toluca.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Tigres are pushing forward but Francisco Meza's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Diego Gonzalez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 38, Tigres's Javier Aquino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toluca defender.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Tigres drive into the zone and Luis Quinones is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Goal! Andre Pierre Gignac gives Tigres a 0-1 lead.
Rafael Carioca instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 43, Free kick Toluca.
Toluca drive forward but Enrique Triverio is judged offside.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Toluca are coming forward and Rubens Sambueza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Tigres a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Toluca.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Kevin Castaneda replacing Alan Medina.
In the minute 45, Tigres make their first substitution with Jorge Torres replacing Jesus Duenas.
The away team replace Javier Aquino with Julian Quinones.
Enrique Triverio gets an equalizer for Toluca. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 45, Adrian Mora with an assist there.
The second-half is underway in Toluca.
In the minute 46, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Toluca a goal kick.
William da Silva for Toluca is whistled offside.
In the minute 51, Julian Quinones gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Tigres's Leonardo Fernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 54, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 57, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Toluca's Alexis Canelo scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Rubens Sambueza.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a third substitution, with Eduardo Vargas replacing Leonardo Fernandez.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 64, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Torres (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 65, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Michael Estrada is replacing Enrique Triverio for the home team.
Adrian Mora of Toluca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 68, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tigres.
Penalty! Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo points to the spot, great chance for Tigres...
Andre Pierre Gignac scores from the spot and Tigres draw level at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Tigres in the half of Toluca.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Eduardo Tercero is on a sub for Luis Rodriguez for Tigres.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Javier Guemez's header is off-target for Toluca.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) has received a yellow card from Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 86, Eduardo Tercero (Tigres) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Joao Plata is replacing William da Silva for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Toluca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tigres.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
The away team have replaced Andre Pierre Gignac with Jordan Sierra. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Alexis Canelo puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
Great play from William da Silva to set up the goal.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Jonatan Maidana replacing Alexis Canelo.
Pablo Lopez is replacing Rubens Sambueza for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
